alert.note: Alert for Graham; Norton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 9:39AM CST until December 27 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... ...BLIZZARD WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Norton and Graham Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Roads may be slick, visibility may lower at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds are forecasted to lower slightly through the day. Blizzard conditions may still be possible at times, but would be intermittent if they did occur. Caution is still urged when driving and check current road conditions before traveling.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
